name: Scene Planner
description: Plan detailed scenes with shots and dialogue
author: raymAIzing film

inputs.label: Scene Objective
inputs.placeholder: Maya confronts Jake about the missing evidence

steps.prompt:
Plan Scene {{sceneNumber}} in detail:

EPISODE CONTEXT: {{episodeContext}}
LOCATION: {{location}}
CHARACTERS: {{characters}}
OBJECTIVE: {{objective}}
TONE: {{emotion}}
DURATION: {{duration}}

Generate:

## SCENE HEADING
{{location}}

## OPENING
- Action/description (what we see)
- Atmosphere setup

## DIALOGUE
Write the full dialogue with:
- Character name
- Dialogue line
- (Subtext note) - what they really mean
- [Action] - physical actions during dialogue

## KEY BEATS
1. Opening beat - how scene starts
2. Rising tension - conflict builds
3. Turning point - something changes
4. Resolution/cliffhanger - how it ends

## SHOT LIST
| Shot # | Type | Description | Duration |
|--------|------|-------------|----------|
| 1 | Wide | Establishing shot | 3s |
[Continue with 5-10 shots]

## VISUAL NOTES
- Lighting setup
- Color mood
- Camera movement suggestions

## AUDIO NOTES
- Dialogue delivery style
- Background music mood
- Sound effects needed

## PROPS & SET
- Required props
- Set dressing notes

## TRANSITION
- How to transition to next scene
